Pre-Game Insights: Egypt's recent form suggests a stronger position, especially with Salah's presence.
Ghana, despite their recent struggles, cannot be underestimated, particularly with the potential inclusion of Kudus in their lineup.
Given both teams' performances in their opening matches and overall recent form, Egypt appears to be slightly favoured.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be televised live on local and satellite television in Nigeria.
Fans can also stream the match live via the appropriate channels.
Coverage will start at 9 PM WAT
Others: Egypt has had the upper hand in matches against Ghana going into their latest meeting at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations.
The two teams have faced each other 23 times, with Egypt winning 12, Ghana winning 5, and 6 matches ending in draws.

Egypt has had to manage without players like Osama Galal and Ahmed Nabil Koita due to pre-tournament injuries, and there's also a concern over Mohamad Hany who was substituted in their opener against Mozambique due to an injury.
Ghana, meanwhile has a fully fit squad with no new major injury concerns.
They are expected to include Inaki Williams and Andre Ayew in their starting lineup.
